cst8284.asgmt3.landRegistry

Class Property

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst8284.asgmt3.landRegistry.Property
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Property
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the property information loaded in a land registry, which permits an administrations and associations to record and track land possession.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Thi Kim Anh Huynh
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • overlaps

        public boolean overlaps(Property prop)
        This check whether the property overlaps or not by using the top, with, length, left of property
        Parameters:
        prop - the prop of property
        Returns:
        true if top is less than top plus width, top plus width greater than top, left is less than left plus length and left plus length greater than left.
